Summary: Biochemical reaction from trazodone to 4'-hydroxytrazodone. This interaction is catalyzed by CYP3A4.
Biochemical reaction from trazodone to m-chlorophenylpiperazine (m-CPP). This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP3A5 or CYP3A4.
Biochemical reaction from m-chlorophenylpiperazine (m-CPP) to hydroxy-m-chlorophenylpiperazine. This interaction is catalyzed by CYP2D6.
